Regular Skins.Name: Black Cub
Regular Skins.Description:
A precious baby Black Bear!
This is the default skin given to all Cub Buddy owners.

Regular Skins.Name: Brown Cub
Regular Skins.Description:
A slightly chubby cub that got into the Royal Jelly. 
Rewarded after completing 300 Brown Bear Quests!

Regular Skins.Name: Robo Cub
Regular Skins.Description:
They forgot a few drives when constructing this Robo Bear.
Rewarded after beating round 25 of Robo Bear's Challenge for the first time, collecting 250,000 Cogs in total, or being top 5 in the Daily Robo Bear scores.

Regular Skins.Name: Stick Cub
Regular Skins.Description:
This stick nymph evolved to camouflage itself as a bear.
Awarded to the top 5 Daily Stick Bug scores. Dropped by Stick Bug (Unbelievably Rare)

Regular Skins.Name: Star Cub
Regular Skins.Description:
A cosmic cub visiting from another galaxy.
Awarded after sticking all 12 Star Signs to the Sticker Stack or obtained from the Sticker Printer.

Limited Skins.Name: Noob Cub
Limited Skins.Description:
This little noob doesn't know the first thing about running a shop.
This was included in the Cub Buddy Launch Pack.
(During Beesmas 2019) Obtained in the Cub Buddy Launch Pack.

Limited Skins.Name: Bee Cub
Limited Skins.Description:
A young polar bear going through an identity crisis.
This was the final reward of Bee Bear's 2019 quests.
(During Beesmas 2019) Obtained through Bee Bear's 2nd Cub Buddy questline.

Limited Skins.Name: Gingerbread Cub
Limited Skins.Description:
A cub made of cookies, brought to life by Honeyday Magic!
Purchased in Bee Bear's 2020 Catalog for 250 Gingerbread Bears.

Limited Skins.Name: Snow Cub
Limited Skins.Description:
This cruel cub was carved from a Level 20 Snowbear's snowball.
This was the final reward of Bee Bear's March 2022 quests.

Limited Skins.Name: Peppermint Robo Cub
Limited Skins.Description:
A clockwork cub composed of cogs and candycanes.
This was the final reward of Bee Bear's April 2023 quests.

Limited Skins.Name: Doodle Cub
Limited Skins.Description: Cut from cardboard and scribbled up with magic crayons. This was the final reward of Bee Bear's Summer 2024 quests.

Limited Skins.Name: Gloomy Cub
Limited Skins.Description: This crybaby's pessimism is reified as a permanent cloud. This is the final reward of Bee Bear's March 2025 quests.
